product_name: Sweet Spot Skirts Groovy Baby Bike Skirt
long_description: The Sweet Spot Skirts Groovy Baby skirt is not only groovy and fun-it's a practical alternative to wrapping your sweatshirt around your waist to cover your tights or bike or running shorts! Wear it on bike rides, at yoga class, at the beach, or even as casual wear over a pair of tights or leggings. The easy-to-wear, wrap design fastens with a double row of snaps and can be adjusted to fit sizes 2-14. The Groovy Baby Skirt from Sweet Spot Skirts is reversible, so you get 2 skirts in one! Designed to wear on the hips, not the waist.
short_description: The Sweet Spot Skirts Groovy Baby skirt is not only groovy and fun-it's a practical alternative to wrapping your sweatshirt around your waist to cover your tights or bike or running shorts!
